TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IServicePartition

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.SuppressMessage("StyleCop.CSharp.OrderingRules", "SA1201:ElementsMustAppearInTheCorrectOrder", Justification="Preserve order of public interface member from V1.")

summary.para: Provides information to the service about the partition to which it belongs and provides methods for the service to interact with the system during runtime.
Provides access to the of the service, which contains the partition type and ID.

exception.para: This indicates that the partition object is closed. The replica/replicator/instance has either been closed or is about to be closed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ReportFault(valuetype System.Fabric.FaultType faultType) cil managed

param.name: faultType
param.para: The that the service has encountered.

summary.para: Enables the replica to report a fault to the runtime and indicates that it has encountered an error from which it cannot recover and must either be restarted or removed.

remarks.para: A fault is typically reported when the service code encounters an issue from which it cannot recover.

exception.para: This indicates that the partition object is closed. The replica/replicator/instance has either been closed or is about to be closed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ReportLoad(class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class System.Fabric.LoadMetric> metrics) cil managed

param.name: metrics
param.para: A collection of to report the load for.

summary.para: Reports the load for a set of load balancing metrics. The load can be reported at any time via the method and provides one or more properties of the method.

remarks.para: The reported metrics should correspond to those that are provided in the as a part of the that is used to create the service. Load metrics that are not present in the description are ignored. Reporting custom metrics allows Service Fabric to balance services that are based on additional custom information.

exception.para: This indicates that the partition object is closed. The replica/replicator/instance has either been closed or is about to be closed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ReportMoveCost(valuetype System.Fabric.MoveCost moveCost) cil managed

summary.para: Reports the move cost for a replica.

remarks.para: Services can report move cost of a replica using this method. While the Service Fabric Resource Balances searches for the best balance in the cluster, it examines both load information and move cost of each replica. Resource balances will prefer to move replicas with lower cost in order to achieve balance.

exception.para: This indicates that the partition object is closed. The replica/replicator/instance has either been closed or is about to be closed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ReportPartitionHealth(class System.Fabric.Health.HealthInformation healthInfo) cil managed

Docs.param: The that describes the health report information, such as source, property, and health state.

remarks.para: The health information describes the report details, like the source ID, the property, the health state and other relevant details. The partition uses an internal health client to send the reports to the health store. The client optimizes messages to Health Manager by batching reports per a configured duration (Default: 30 seconds). If the report has high priority, you can specify send options to send it immediately by using .

exception.para: This indicates that the partition object is closed. The replica/replicator/instance has either been closed or is about to be closed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ReportPartitionHealth(class System.Fabric.Health.HealthInformation healthInfo, class System.Fabric.Health.HealthReportSendOptions sendOptions) cil managed

Docs.param: The that describes the health report information, such as source, property, and health state.

param.name: sendOptions
param.para: The that controls how the partition report is sent.

remarks.para: The health information describes the report details, like the source ID, the property, the health state and other relevant details. The partition uses an internal health client to send the reports to the health store. The client optimizes messages to Health Manager by batching reports per a configured duration (Default: 30 seconds). If the report has high priority, you can specify send options to send it immediately.

exception.para: This indicates that the partition object is closed. The replica/replicator/instance has either been closed or is about to be closed.
